value.0: So, you think you are a big tough <race>. Well, I'll show you, my <lad/lass>. Drink with me and prove your worth....
You see... None can drink like a halforc... Stupid git! Now get lost, before you fall over your own feet.
My kind of <boy/girl>. Lets see if you can take some good Ale. Go!

Comment.value: Player player falling/ sitting down animation. Apply drunken simulating effect for a few minutes.

value.0: Can't even stand after one beer! What kind of <boy/girl> are you? Pathetic. Get out of my sight.

value.0: Water... Elven Wine might give you a little more trouble.
